attributes.action: make syntehtic fleece compulsory on penalty of mild electrocution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every office, school, home and caravan should be equipped with syntehtic fleece in one form or other, to ensure that the fleece experience becomes universal and so as to facilitate a reduction in the deaths of pensioners due to inadequate public pension funds.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
